rooms.description: An inviting entrance area with a reception desk near the front door, adhering to Vastu's north-east corner placement for positive energy.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side to allow ample natural light while respecting privacy and local climatic conditions.
Adjacent to the kitchen, oriented towards the south-east for energy flow, with a central dining table area.
A private suite for guests located near the living area; designed with additional window space for light and air circulation.
A corridor connecting rooms, ensuring easy navigation in compliance with local accessibility norms.

openings.features: Double door, sliding glass panel integrated with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light while ensuring security and ventilation.
Floor-to-ceiling window for expansive views; designed for maximum daylight penetration in line with Vastu principles that favor open spaces.
Open balcony space providing ventilation and a relaxing outdoor area, adhering to local building guidelines for residential units.
